#include <iostream>
#include <cstdio> 
#include <algorithm> 
using namespace std;
int n,m;
int a[50];
void solve() {
	double temp; 
	cin >> temp; 
	int x = (temp+0.005) * 100; 
	int num; 
	for(int i = n-1; i>=0; i--){
		if(x >= a[i]){
			num = x/a[i]; 
			x = x - num * a[i]; 
			if(a[i] % 100 ) printf("%0.2f %d\n", a[i]/100., num); 
			else printf("%d %d\n", a[i]/100, num); 
		}
	}
}
int main(int argc, char *argv[]) {
	int t; 
	cin >> t; 
	double temp; 
	for(int cs=1; cs<=t; cs++){
		cout << "Case " << cs << ":\n"; 
		cin >> n >> m;
		 
		for(int i=0;i<n;i++){
			cin >> temp; 
			a[i] = (temp+0.005) *100;
		}
		sort(a,a+n); 
		for(int sn = 1; sn <= m; sn++){ 
			cout << "Scenario " << sn << ":\n"; 
			solve(); 
		}
	}
}
